articles.title: Dravid to attend Asia Cup selection on Monday; focus on batting lineup | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: A formal clearance from the NCA is awaited on KL Rahul's fitness
articles.content:
Head coach Rahul Dravid has been summoned to attend the selection meeting in Delhi. © Getty
